title: Is THIS the future of monitors?? - Corsair Xeneon Flex

Check out the new Xeneon Flex Monitor at   Plouffe has seen a monitor, but Corsair hand-delivered their next greatest screen -- the Xeneon Flex -- which has a crazy new feature... you can bend the monitor from flat to curved!  Is this a killer new feature, or just a gimmick?  Want us to unbox something?
